title: Implement Secure User Registration
description: As a new banking customer, I want to securely register in the application, so that I can create an account with validated identity and access my banking services safely.
priority_business_value: High — foundational for enabling secure access to all users.
attributes_and_rules: Collect personal details, verify identity, encrypt passwords, comply with KYC standards.
core_domain_objects: User, Registration Form, Identity Verification, OTP, Password
acceptance_criteria: User can complete registration with valid details.
System sends OTP for identity verification.
Password is encrypted before storage.
Invalid registration attempts are rejected with appropriate errors.
test_cases: Given a new user with valid personal details, When they submit the registration form, Then the system should create a new account after successful OTP verification.
Given an invalid OTP, When the user tries to verify identity, Then the system should not complete registration and display an appropriate error message.

title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
description: As a registered user, I want to log in using multi-factor authentication, so that my account remains secure from unauthorized access.
priority_business_value: High — critical for compliance and protecting user data.
attributes_and_rules: Support password + OTP or biometric authentication, ensure session token security.
acceptance_criteria: System requires MFA during login.
MFA verification must be completed successfully before granting access.
Session tokens must expire on logout or inactivity.
Failed MFA attempts should alert the user and restrict further attempts after defined limits.
test_cases: Given a valid registered user, When they log in and provide the correct credentials and OTP, Then they should gain access successfully.
Given incorrect MFA code, When the user attempts login, Then the system should deny access and display an error.

title: Display Linked Account Details
description: As a user, I want to view all my linked bank accounts in one place, so that I can monitor balances and recent transactions easily.
priority_business_value: High — essential for user visibility and satisfaction.
attributes_and_rules: Integrate securely with core banking APIs, retrieve balances in real-time.
acceptance_criteria: System should display all accounts linked to the user profile.
Real-time balances are fetched securely through APIs.
Users can refresh to see updated account information.
Sensitive account data should be masked appropriately.
test_cases: Given a logged-in user with multiple accounts, When they navigate to the accounts view, Then all their linked accounts and balances should display correctly.
Given an API failure, When the user tries to refresh account details, Then a user-friendly error message should appear.

title: Enable Intra-bank Fund Transfer
description: As a customer, I want to transfer funds between my accounts within the same bank, so that I can manage my finances conveniently.
priority_business_value: High — improves customer flexibility and reduces operational friction.
attributes_and_rules: Allow transfers between accounts owned by the same user with instant settlement.
acceptance_criteria: User can select source and destination accounts within the same bank.
Transfer amount is validated against available balance.
Transaction receipt is generated after successful transfer.
Failed transactions are logged and clearly reported.
test_cases: Given valid source and destination accounts, When the user transfers funds within limits, Then the amount should be transferred immediately and a confirmation shown.
Given insufficient balance, When the user tries to transfer funds, Then the system should prevent the operation and display an error.

epic_title: Utility Bill Payments and Recharge Services
title: Integrate Utility Bill Payment Feature
description: As a customer, I want to pay my electricity and water bills through the banking app, so that I can manage all my payments conveniently in one place.
priority_business_value: Medium — increases customer engagement and convenience.
attributes_and_rules: Integrate securely with biller APIs, support instant payment confirmation, store payment receipts.
acceptance_criteria: User can search and add billers using account number or customer ID.
Payment should be processed securely through integrated gateways.
Successful payments should generate a confirmation receipt.
Failed payments should include proper failure codes and retry options.
test_cases: Given a registered biller and valid payment data, When the user initiates a bill payment, Then the payment should complete successfully and a receipt displayed.
Given gateway downtime, When the user initiates a bill payment, Then the system should show a 'Payment Failed' message with retry guidance.

title: Display Loan and Credit Summary
description: As a user, I want to view my active loans and credit card summaries, so that I can track payments, dues, and interest easily.
priority_business_value: High — improves transparency and user trust.
attributes_and_rules: Retrieve data from loan management and credit APIs in real-time.
acceptance_criteria: User can see details of all active loans and credit cards.
Each entry displays payment due, interest rate, and outstanding balance.
Data refreshes accurately with live data source.
Sensitive credit data must be securely handled.
test_cases: Given a user with multiple loans, When they open the credit overview, Then all relevant accounts should be displayed with current data.
Given stale API data, When user tries to refresh, Then updated loan and credit data should load successfully.

title: Provide Categorized Transaction Insights
description: As a user, I want my transactions to be categorized and summarized, so that I can understand my spending patterns.
priority_business_value: Medium — enhances user engagement through financial awareness.
attributes_and_rules: Auto-categorize transactions into predefined categories using AI models.
acceptance_criteria: Transactions are categorized automatically upon synchronization.
User can view categories such as Food, Travel, Utilities, etc.
Monthly spending reports are displayed in a visual format.
Incorrect categorizations can be manually corrected by the user.
test_cases: Given a month of transactions, When the user views the insights dashboard, Then categorized spending summaries should appear.
Given miscategorized data, When the user edits the category, Then the updated classification should reflect immediately in reports.

title: Implement Real-Time Fraud Detection
description: As a bank security analyst, I want suspicious transactions to be flagged automatically, so that potential fraud can be investigated quickly.
priority_business_value: High — prevents financial losses and enhances security.
attributes_and_rules: Leverage AI to detect unusual spending or login activity, trigger alerts automatically.
core_domain_objects: Transaction, Fraud Alert, User, Security Log
acceptance_criteria: System detects unusual transaction patterns in real-time.
Fraudulent or high-risk transactions are flagged instantly.
Both users and the security team are notified immediately.
Flagged transactions are logged for future analysis.
test_cases: Given a high-value transaction from a new device, When it is processed, Then the system should flag it and send an alert to the user.
Given normal transaction activity, When processed, Then it should not trigger a fraud alert.
